topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Deploy the Accelerate PID Patch

body.p: This patch resolves the issue Failed to launch the accelerated daemon encountered in the hlm deploy process during installation.

section.p: To download the patch you need from the Software Updates and Licensing site, shown above:

ol.li: Select the required patch file (e.g.HCG 2.0 Accelerate001 Patch023) from the Downloads list and then click Download.

Un-tar the downladed files (compressed patch files with extension tar.gz and .tar) until the knc-accelerate-pid.patch and readme files are available. The readme with the patch download contains information on files changed by these patches.The Software Licensing site lists and displays patch file names individually for all the three versions of HCG ( HCG_1.1, HCG_2.0 and HCG_2.1) under Software Specification and Download filename. Regardless of their version number, these files are referencing the same files as extracted in the readme.

Check if the MD5 checksum verification file is extracted along with the patch file.
For validating the integrity of the downloaded file, you can run the MD5 checksum verification on the downloaded patch file and verify if the fingerprint of the file matches the version available on the server.

Log onto the lifecycle manager VM.ssh <lifecycle manager_VM_IP>
where: lifecycle manager_VM_IP is the CLM IP of the lifecycle manager. Locate the IP address for the lifecycle manager in the /root/infra-ansible-playbooks/group_vars/all file under hlm_clmstaticip field.
Copy the knc-accelerate-pid.patch file to the ~/ directory.
Execute the following command to deploy the patch: patch -p1 -b < ../knc-accelerate-pid.patch
Execute the following command to integrate the changes into the environment:./hlm_prepare-env.sh
Execute the following command: hlm generate -c <cloud name>
